attributes.action: Primary age children to be exempt from the rule of six.
attributes.additional_details:
Make primary age children exempt from
the rule of six so children of larger families can see grandparents, cousins and family friends.
attributes.background: As a family of 5 we have been unable to see friends and family for a long time and fear that if the rule of six is used again and includes children it will be many more months before we can see our family. So many families are going through this.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government have yet to announce plans for rules once the lockdown ends.
